thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: Pat

author: Pat
title: Pat
text:
The tours were great, my granddaughter and I had an amazing trip.
The hotels that Goway reserved for us were very nice, some a little better then others. The whole experience traveling from hotel to hotel and plane to plane was in itself an adventure, but what came out of it was a trip of a life time. We were able to see everything we had requested to see from Goway on our journey.
Thank you Goway
for giving my grandaughter and I a wonderful vacation
